testcase.name: should be able to login with valid credentials - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given I landed on an e-commerce page........................................passed And navigate to Login page..................................................passed And I can see "New Customer" and "Returning Customer" sub headings texts....passed And "Register Account" sub header is displayed..............................passed And I can see aside widget labels count as "13" first label "Login" and last "Newsletter".passed And I login in login page as a returning customer...........................passed And I click on Login button.................................................passed Then should be presented with the following validation message as "My Account".passed And I tap on Your Edit Account Information link in aside widget.............passed And Updated account information excluding email with the following details below:.passed And click edit account Continue button......................................passed And I should see confirmation message "Success: Your account has been successfully updated.".passed When I clicks on Logout link in aside Widget................................passed And "Account Logout" text is displayed......................................passed And I tap logout Continue Button............................................passed And back to index page title as "Your Store"................................passed

testcase.name: should not be able to login with invalid credentials - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given I landed on an e-commerce page........................................passed And navigate to Login page..................................................passed And I can see "New Customer" and "Returning Customer" sub headings texts....passed And "Register Account" sub header is displayed..............................passed And I can see aside widget labels count as "13" first label "Login" and last "Newsletter".passed And I login in login page as a returning customer...........................passed And I click on Login button.................................................passed Then should be presented with the following Error validation message as "Warning:".passed And back to login page title as "Account Login".............................passed
